summary: A group of sinners involved in interconnected tales of murder, revenge, deceit and adultery all meet at the Gates of Hell.
cast: Shigeru Amachi|Utako Mitsuya|Yôichi Numata|Hiroshi Hayashi|Jun Ôtomo|Akiko Yamashita|Kiyoko Tsuji|Fumiko Miyata|Akira Nakamura|Kimie Tokudaiji|Akiko Ono|Tomohiko Ôtani|Kôichi Miya|Sakutarô Yamakawa|Rei Ishikawa|Hiroshi Shingûji|Hiroshi Izumida|Yôzô Takamura|Yûzô Harumi|Katsuzô Kitamura|Eiichi Shinobu|Kazuki Nishi|Shinji Suzuki|Takashi Yamaguchi|Akira Katô|Minoru Miyake|Takamitsu Watanabe|Tatsuhiro Oka|Kanjûrô Arashi
title: Jigoku
